ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T22:14:48 [Issue ID 4000-102495] urn:comicvine:4000-102495 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:38:15. [Issue ID 227447]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ultraforce attacks Atalon to finally stop his assault against Earth. While Pixx uses her illusionary abilities to get to the warheads, the rest of Ultraforce attacks Atalon and his forces as a diversion. While searching the warheads, Pixx finds Ghoul, who takes her to the warheads. A member of Atalon's forces finds Pixx and Ghoul and is able to destroy Pixx's containment suit, meant to protect her against the radiation of the warheads. Feeling that her life is worth the sacrifice she continues to dismantle each warheads while being irradiated. Atalon finally realizes that the battle against him was just a diversion and gives up the fight, knowing the warheads have been taken care of, but not at a price: Pixx is dead.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-22 22:05:26. [Issue ID 102495]
